user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mark Johnson (mark@helpinghands.org) with the necessary details for the upcoming charity gala. You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{
  "to": ["mark@helpinghands.org"],
  "subject": "Charity Gala – Key Details and Next Steps",
  "body": "Hi Mark,

Here are the key details for the upcoming Helping Hands Foundation Charity Gala:

• Date: March 5th, 2022  
• Time: 6:00–11:00 PM  
• Venue: Grand Ballroom, Metropolitan Hotel  
• Program highlights: silent auction, dinner, live music, and an award ceremony.  
• Guest speaker: Mr. Thomas Anderson, a renowned philanthropist.

Action items:
1. Please confirm volunteer assignments (registration desk, auction assistance, ushers, etc.).
2. Share the finalized guest list so we can prepare name badges and seating arrangements.
3. Let me know if you need any additional information or materials from my side.

Thanks for coordinating all the moving parts. Looking forward to a successful evening!

Best regards,

[Your Name]"
}
